ExternalData.Subtitlesect: Amendment to article 43 (2) of the Convention on the Rights of the Child

TreatyText.Label: Text
TreatyText.Text: United Nations, Treaty Series, vol. 2100, p. 210; Doc. CRC/SP/1995/L.1/Rev.1.

TreatyNote.Text: The amendment was proposed by the Government of Costa Rica and circulated by the Secretary-General under cover of depositary notification C.N.138.1995.TREATIES-3 of 22 May 1995 in accordance with article 50 (1) of the Convention. The Conference of the States Parties, convened by the Secretary-General in accordance with article 50 (1) of the Convention, adopted the amendment on 12 December 1995 which was subsequently approved by General Assembly in Resolution No. 155 of 21December 1995.
